price: Na hakika wao wanawazuilia Njia na wenyewe wanadhani kuwa wameongoka.
arabic: وَإِنَّهُمۡ لَيَصُدُّونَهُمۡ عَنِ ٱلسَّبِيلِ وَيَحۡسَبُونَ أَنَّهُم مُّهۡتَدُونَ
footnotes: Na hakika Mashetani wanao jitia upofu na Qur'ani huwazuia na Njia anayo itia Rahmani. Na hao wanao tumiliwa wanadhani kwa kuwafuata rafiki zao kwamba wao wamo katika uwongofu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wa-innahum layaṣuddūnahum ʿani al-sabīli wayaḥsabūna annahum muh'tadūna
